EXPO_INFO.description: Master tracking table for export product registration, dossier submission, and regulatory status.

columns.SUBMITTED_TO_REGULARITY: Date when the dossier was submitted to the foreign authority.
columns.APPROVAL_DATE: Date when the registration was officially approved.

EXPO_ABC.description: Agent and Business Contact information for export markets.

columns.AGENT_COMPANY: Name of the partner company in the foreign country.

EXPO_COUNTRY_WISE_PRODUCTS.description: List of specific products approved or assigned to specific countries.

columns.PACK_SIZE: Packaging size (e.g., '10''s'). Note: contains single quotes.

EXPO_PLANT.description: Mapping of Plant IDs to Factory Names.

columns.PLANT_ID: Unique ID (STRING, e.g., '1100'). Use this to join with other tables.

EXPORT_INSTITUTE_SALES_DETAILS.description: Transactional sales data for Export and Institutional sales. WARNING: Date column is Text.

columns.SALES_MONTH: Month of sale as TEXT (e.g., 'JAN-21' or 'SEP-2023'). Use LIKE '%2023%' to filter. DO NOT use date functions.

LONG_LIST_INFORMATION.description: Central Product Lifecycle Management (PLM) table. Tracks a product from R&D to Regulatory Submission.

columns.IRA_PROD_NAME: Product Name used by Regulatory Affairs.
columns.RDA_API_AVAIL: Status of Active Pharmaceutical Ingredient availability for R&D.

SCM_BLOCKLIST_MATERIAL.description: The MAIN Active table for Approved Raw Materials & Packaging Blocklists for the CURRENT fiscal year.

columns.BLOCKLIST_NO: Unique Blocklist ID (e.g., 'I003-2025-001'). Key for joining with Clearance.

SCM_BLOCKLIST_MATERIAL_24_25.description: ARCHIVE: Blocklist data for the 2024-2025 fiscal year. Only query if user asks for history.

SCM_APP_BLOCKLIST.description: Applications for Blocklist approval. These are requests, not yet approved/active blocklists.

SCM_CLEARANCE.description: Tracks the actual arrival and customs clearance of goods against a Blocklist.

columns.CRTF_DATE: Date of Clearance Certificate (Actual Arrival Date).
columns.QTY: Quantity actually cleared/arrived in this shipment.

SCM_COMPANY_INFO.description: Master list of Incepta Business Units / Plants.

SCM_MATERIAL_MANAGEMENT.description: Central Hub for Procurement. Links PR (Requisition), PO (Order), and LC (Bank) numbers together.

SCM_MATERIAL_PURCHASE_INFO.description: Detailed logistics tracking. Use this for Shipment Status, Tracking Numbers, and Arrival Dates.

columns.LC_OPEN_STATUS: Status of the LC opening process.

SCM_FINANCE_MANAGEMENT.description: Financial status of LCs. Use this for Payment Dues and Maturity Dates.

columns.DUE_DATE_ACTUAL: The date when payment must be made to the bank.
columns.ACCEPT_VAL: The accepted value in foreign currency.

SCM_COMPARATIVE_MASTER_UP.description: Price comparison history for raw materials. WARNING: Price column is text.

columns.LAST_UNIT_PRICE_KG: TEXT FIELD (e.g., 'USD 32.75'). Do NOT calculate SUM/AVG on this directly. Extract number if needed.

SCM_PR_RQ_RAW_MAT_UP.description: Raw Material Purchase Requisitions (PR). The start of the buying process.

columns.MATERIAL_GROUP: SAP Material Group Code (Join with SCM_SAP_MATERIAL_GROUP).

SCM_SAP_MATERIAL_GROUP.description: Mapping of Material Group Codes to Names.

SCM_SHORT_PRODUCT_LIST.description: Critical table for Stock vs Demand analysis. Use this to find shortages.

SCM_WARNING_MATERIAL.description: Tracks materials with specific Blocklist risks (e.g., low remaining quantity vs approved quantity).

columns.AVL_QTY: Available Quantity remaining in the blocklist.
columns.QTY: Original Approved Quantity in the blocklist.

SCM_TRIAL_REQ.description: The starting point of a Packaging Material Trial. Contains product and supplier details.

columns.ITEM_DESC: Description of the packaging item (e.g., 'Lami tube').

SCM_TRIAL_FINAL.description: The final verdict of a Packaging Trial.

columns.REMARKS: The Outcome. Look for 'Trial Ok', 'Trial Not Ok', or 'For PQ Test'.

SCM_SUPPLIER_LIST.description: Master directory of all local and foreign suppliers.

SCM_FP_DATA.description: Finished Product Master List. Use this for querying Brands.

SCM_MM_DATA.description: Raw Material Master List. Use this for querying Chemicals/APIs.

SCM_UNIT_LIST.description: Mapping of internal Unit of Measure (UOM) codes to text.
